definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
persisting in evil brings about self-destruction (idiom)
pinyin: duo1 xing2 bu4 yi4 bi4 zi4 bi4

sentences.english: Is there iniquity in my tongue?
He therefore thought that the use of their negligence, earn ill- gotten gains.
sentences.chinese: 於是他就想到，利用他們的疏忽，賺取不義之財。

sentences.english: Oppressed and condemned, he was taken away, and who would have thought any more of his destiny?
sentences.chinese: 他受了不義的審判而被除掉，有誰懷念他的命運？

sentences.english: And I brake the jaws of the wicked, and plucked the spoil out of his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 我打破不義之人的牙牀，從他牙齒中奪了所搶的。

sentences.english: The sight of an injustice offends the sense of justice.
sentences.chinese: 見不義之行則傷及正義之心。

sentences.english: For I will forgive their wickedness and will remember their sins no more.
sentences.chinese: 我要寬恕他們的不義，不再記念他們的罪愆。

sentences.english: The question is whether it is possible to be unrighteous and happy.
sentences.chinese: 問題是可不可能做個又不義又快樂的人。

sentences.english: All iniquity is sin. And there is a sin unto death.
sentences.chinese: 任何的不義都是罪過，但也有不至於死的罪過。

sentences.english: Never use the terms “filthy lucre” or “I despise money.”
sentences.chinese: 永遠不要使用詞語“不義之財”或“我鄙視金錢。”

sentences.english: And in every sort of evil that deceives those who are perishing .
sentences.chinese: 並且在那沉淪的人身上，行各樣出於不義的詭詐。

sentences.english: And the Lord said, "Listen to what the unjust judge says."
sentences.chinese: 主說，你們聽這不義之官所說的話。

sentences.english: The bank robbers went to Brazil to live on their ill-gotten gains.
sentences.chinese: 那些銀行搶竊者們到巴西去拿不義之財生活。

sentences.english: It does not rejoice because of unrighteousness, but rejoices with the truth.
sentences.chinese: 不因不義而歡樂，卻與真理同歡樂。

sentences.english: Treasures gained by wickedness do not profit, but righteousness delivers from death.
sentences.chinese: 不義之財毫無益處，唯有公義能救人脫離死亡。

sentences.english: For I will be merciful toward their iniquities , and I will remember their sins no more.
sentences.chinese: 我要寬恕他們的不義，不再記念他們的罪愆。

sentences.english: The only verdict is vengeance, a vendetta…
sentences.chinese: 對他們唯一的裁決就是復仇，多行不義必自斃。

definition: variant of 兇惡|凶恶, fierce/ferocious/fiendish/frightening
virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
to have a sense of shame
